mapper.insert: insert into tbhostver (fsFileName, fsHost, fsVer, fsDateTime) values (#{fsfilename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fshost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fsver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fsdatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into tbhostver
fsFileName,
fsHost,
fsVer,
fsDateTime,
